titles.title: Recognizing National School Breakfast Week from March 2nd through March 6th, 2020, and expressing the sense of Congress that providing breakfast in schools through the National School Breakfast Program has a positive impact on classroom performance.

Recognizing National School Breakfast Week from March 2nd through March 6th, 2020, and expressing the sense of Congress that providing breakfast in schools through the National School Breakfast Program has a positive impact on classroom performance.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the importance of the School Breakfast Program and its positive impact on the classroom performance of participating students.
